title: What is CS0234?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: You are seeing the following error in the console window:
error CS0234: The type or namespace `_____' does not exist in the namespace `_____'. Are you missing an assembly reference?

sections.title: Cause
content: This error is caused when you try to access a type or namespace that does not exist within a valid namespace.
error CS0234: The type or namespace `DateTim' does not exist in the namespace `System'. Are you missing an assembly reference?

sections.title: Resolution
content: Ensure that the type or namespace you are trying to use derives from the namespace that proceeds it.
